snippet.title: Adam Wells
snippet.description:
Adam Wells (@adamactualwells) Despite popular belief, video did not kill the radio star. Heart, BBC, Cornwall Unplugged - Twitterings are my brain vomits. Not theirs. Location: Truro, Cornwall Joined twitter: January 25th, 2009 Web: http://t.co/Ewmf2ehHBx
204 followers
258 following
2,530 updates
